com.lithium.community.android.rest

Class LiRestv2Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lithium.community.android.rest.LiRestClient
      • com.lithium.community.android.rest.LiRestv2Client

  • public class LiRestv2Client
extends LiRestClient
    Rest v2 client for community. Always expects LiQL queries in requests

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(LiSDKManager manager)
                       throws LiInitializationException

        Initializes the Rest Client singleton. If the initialization is successful getInstance() will return an initialized SDK Manager. This function may or may not create a new instance or reinitialize with subsequent calls.

        Parameters:
        manager - A Li SDK manager
        Throws:
        LiInitializationException - if the Rest client fails to initialize.

      • getInstance

        Returns:
        Instance of this class.

      • uploadProcessAsync

        public void uploadProcessAsync(LiBaseRestRequest baseRestRequest,
                               LiAsyncRequestCallback callBack,
                               java.lang.String imagePath,

        Makes Async call for uploading an image.
        Parameters:

        callBack - LiAsyncRequestCallback
        imagePath - Absolute path of the image file.
        imageName - Name of the image file.
        requestBody - request body for post call to upload image.
